description_for_model: Plugin that gives you the ability to answer questions related to sport performance. You will be able to get a set of instructions that will give you the ability to answer the following sport performance tasks: athlete-question-answering, sport-team-question-answering, sport-event-question-answering, athlete-to-competition-comparison-question-answering, sport-team-to-competition-comparison-question-answering. Creating training programs for olympic weightlifting - for this task you will be given the training program and a description of the training program together. I want you to analyze the entire description of the training and then extract the training program and give it to the user.
description_for_human: Plugin for answering questions related to sport performance.
